VALIDATION.IS_NOT_ALLOWED_TO_BE_EMPTY: is not allowed to be empty
VALIDATION.LENGTH_MUST_BE_LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO_CHA: length must be less than or equal to {'limit'} characters long
VALIDATION.LENGTH_MUST_BE_AT_LEAST_CHARACTERS_LONG: length must be at least {'limit'} characters long
VALIDATION.BATCHID_MUST_BE_12_CHARACTER_LONG: batch id must be {'limit'} character long

DATABASE.DAY_NOT_STARTED_ERROR: You have not started your day
DATABASE.END_DAY_ERROR: You have already ended your day
DATABASE.ROUTE_START_ERROR: You have already started your route
DATABASE.ROUTE_DAY_START_ERROR: Your day is not started. Please start your day first.
DATABASE.ROUTE_END_START_ERROR: You have not started your route. Start your route first.
DATABASE.ROUTE_END_ERROR: You have already ended your route.
DATABASE.ROUTE_END_DAY_ERROR: You have already ended your day.
DATABASE.CUSTOMER_CONTACT_ADDED: Customer contact has been added successfully
DATABASE.REQUEST_SENT_TO_AM: Request sent to AM and you will get notify on approval
DATABASE.ROUTE_END_INCOMPLETE_ORDER_EXIST: your orders are still incomplete, either complete them or skip them
DATABASE.ORDER_ALREADY_COMPLETED: this order is already completed, you can not move this order in any other batch
DATABASE.CAN_NOT_MOVE: batch can not be move because both the batch dates are same
DATABASE.DATA_SYNCED: data synced, you can not do changes now
DATABASE.CUSTOMER_CARD_ADDED: Customer card has been added successfully
DATABASE.ORDERLIST_CAN_NOT_EMPTY: order list can not be empty
DATABASE.ONLY_ONE_FIELD_ALLOWED_TO_FILLED: only one field, either 'notification date' or 'day' allowed to fill
DATABASE.CUSTOMER_CAN_NOT_EMPTY: customer list can not be empty
DATABASE.ORDER_CUSTOMER_SAME_TIME_FILLED: only one field, either 'order list' or 'customer list' allowed to fill
DATABASE.BATCH_ALREADY_STARTED_YOU_CAN_NOT_MOVE: batch already started, you can not re-route this batch
DATABASE.SURVEY_ALREADY_SUBMIT: survey already submitted for this selection
DATABASE.START_DATE_BLANK_ERROR: start day can not be blank
DATABASE.END_DATE_BLANK_ERROR: end day can not be blank
